text:
The JDBCRealm documentation at:

http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.0-doc/realm-howto.html

states that you should separate the connectionURL's user/password combination 
with a semi-colon (;).  This does not work on Mac OS X or Red Hat - but 
replacing the semi-colon with a & does.

This solution does not affect the Windows version.
